"About saving/loading the state of progr: "In this quest, as the state of progression will be saved, even if the quest is aborted, it is possible to continue playing from a designated location."

"About saving the state of progression  When the state of progression during a quest is saved, the message, [Progression of Quest has been saved] will be displayed.  Thereafter, it is possible to play the quest again from that location."

"About loading the state of progression  After the quest has been accepted, with the state of progression being saved, once you enter the Telepipe inside the Camp Ship, a confirmation window will be displayed."
"Here, if you choose [Continue Playing], you can continue to play from the previous state of progression.  *Saved data will not be deleted even if you choose to continue playing."
